info.name: GradeFlow API
info.description: A comprehensive collection for the GradeFlow School Management System API

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for user authentication and account management

request.description: Register a super admin user
Register a new school and school admin
Login a user
Get the currently logged in user
Update user details
Update user password
Send password reset email
Reset password using token
Get all schools (SuperAdmin only)
Get a single school by ID
Create a new school (SuperAdmin only)
Update a school
Delete a school (SuperAdmin only)
Get all users (SuperAdmin/SchoolAdmin only)
Get a single user by ID
Create a new user (SuperAdmin/SchoolAdmin only)
Update a user
Delete a user (SuperAdmin/SchoolAdmin only)

item.name: 4. Academic Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing academic sessions and terms

body.raw:
{
  "title": "End of Term Examination",
  "description": "First term examination for all classes",
  "startDate": "2022-12-01",
  "endDate": "2022-12-10",
  "location": "School Premises",
  "eventType": "exam",
  "targetAudience": ["students", "teachers"],
  "classes": ["60d0fe4f5311236168a109d5", "60d0fe4f5311236168a109d6"],
  "sendEmail": true
}
